DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study compare cognitive score ( attention , executive function work memory ) different e-Cigarette strength usual cigarette .
DOC.detailed_description: The study randomise cross-over trial design compare : 1 ) Cognitive performance level four different e-Cigarette strength . Participants request abstain smoke alcohol 20:00 night study day food caffeine least 1 h session . On arrival study centre , carbon monoxide ( CO ) measure participant ' expire breath . If CO > 15 part per million ( ppm ) , assign study treatment allocate ; however , CO > 15 ppm report smoke previous 12 h , participant reschedule wherever possible subsequent session . On first study day , participant randomise use one five ordered condition : Electronic Nicotine Delivery Device ( ENDD ) ( fourth generation ) contain nicotine 2,4 % ; Electronic Nicotine Delivery Device ( ENDD ( second generation ) contain nicotine 7,4 mg ; Electronic Nicotine Delivery Device ( ENDD contain nicotine 9 mg ; Electronic Nicotine Delivery Device ( ENDD nicotine free ; usual cigarette . Additionally participant train use electronic cigarette . The following test complete visit : Continuous Performance Test - AX version ( CPT-AX ) , Wisconsin card sort test ( WCST ) , Working memory test ( N-BACK ) .
DOC.criteria: 20 regular smoker ( smoke â‰¥ 15 factorymade cigarette per day least past 10 year currently attempt quit smoke wish next 30 day , CO > 10 part per million ) recruit local Hospital staff Catania , Italy . people report recent myocardial infarction , angina pectoris serious medical condition ( diabetes mellitus , severe allergy , poorly control asthma airway disease , poorly control psychiatric disorder current chemical dependence nicotine ) pregnancy , breastfeeding , blood pressure > 180 mm Hg systolic and/or 100 mm Hg diastolic , weight < 45 > 120 kg , current use smoking cessation medication
